content.html: This week I worked with a team to get code coverage over 80% (a corporate minimum). The problem with this effort: Code coverage can be gamed. Sure, low code coverage means there's a lot of untested code. But, high code coverage doesn't mean the code is well tested.
content.value:
This week I worked with a team to get code coverage over 80% (a corporate minimum). 

The problem with this effort: Code coverage can be gamed.

Sure, low code coverage means there's a lot of untested code.

But, high code coverage doesn't mean the code is well tested.
